name: GDPR Cookies pro
author: Purplelight Software

sections.description:
GDPR cookie consent adds a simple banner to your website in order to comply with the European Union GDPR cookie law.

You can place the notice at the top or bottom of your website and easily customize it with the help of the live preview. You can change background color, text color, buttons style, font size, and so on.

Do not bother every visitor to your website with the cookie banner. You can enable it only for European Union visitors.

Create your cookies page with just one click, you don´t need to write anything!

You can either let the cookie bar disappear after a few seconds or accept by scrolling down.

FEATURES

  • Location filter: do not bother your users and make it show only in European countries
  • Generate your cookies policy page with just one click
  • Cookies policy page available in all European Union languages
  • Fully customizable: modify size, position, colors and style
  • 3 animation style: none, fade or slide
  • 2 styles: bar and fullscreen
  • Live preview: what you see is what you get
  • Optional: Hide on scroll
  • Optional: Hide after X seconds
  • Easy translatable to your language: includes POT template

short_description: An easy way to get GDPR cookies consent with location filter and fully customizable.
